rules.description: char layer
Poker: change shift esc to ` and ~
Poker: change backslash to del
Poker: change del to backslash
change control to control and esc.
change command to alfred and command.
change option to clipboard history and option.
Change spacebar to option.
Change quote to super (command + control + option + shift).
Change super + 1 to left space
Change super + 2 to right space
Change left shift to ( and shift.
Change right shift to ) and shift.
Change right option to backslash
Change right command to pipe
Change shift right command to backslash
right command + mid line to numbers, hhkb is command
right command + dot to dot, for ip input
right command + : to :
right command + q to -, hhkb is command
right command + w to +, hhkb is command
right command + e to backslash, hhkb is command
switch space
Emacs key bindings [control+keys] (rev 10)
Emacs key bindings [option+keys] (rev 5)
